column5: This beautiful 2-bed 2-bath has everything you need to live like a local in Dallas. This furnished 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo offers a fully equipped kitchen, stainless steel appliances, Acacia hardwood flooring, in-home washer and dryer, rooftop pool, fitness center, and sundeck, and sleeps up to 5 people.
column8: In the Heart of Downtown Dallas LV2
